alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 16 at 1:56AM MST until February 18 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. Areas of blowing snow possible from recent snowfall...reducing visibility to under a half mile at times. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers, with a risk for blow overs.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
